snippet: The F.B.I. director Robert S. Mueller III met with Russian officials in Moscow on Tuesday to discuss the  the Boston bombings, according to American officials.
lead_paragraph: The F.B.I. director Robert S. Mueller III met with Russian officials in Moscow on Tuesday to discuss the  the Boston bombings, according to American officials.

headline.seo: Russia: F.B.I. Director in Moscow to Discuss Boston Bombings
headline.main: Russia: F.B.I. Director in Moscow to Discuss Boston Bombings
headline.print_headline: Russia: F.B.I. Director in Moscow to Discuss Boston Bombings
